parameterdescription.para: Whether the motor direction should be flipped.

briefdescription.para: Flips the direction of the encoder.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the encoder direction should be flipped.

briefdescription.para: Sets the minimum and maximum speed of the motor.

Pointer to store the maximum speed.

simplesect.para: True if encoder is available, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the motor is stalled.
Stops the motor based on the stop behaviour set using setStopBehaviour(MotorState motorStopState).
Holds the motor in its current position.
Applys braking force on the motor to stop the motor.
Runs the motor at a specified speed.

Runs the motor for a specified motor degree.
Runs the motor for a specified time.
Runs the motor to a specified absolute position.

parameterdescription.para: Wait for action to be completed.
